meanings.definition: An enzyme that catalyzes the phosphorylation of glucose to glucose-6-phosphate.
meanings.sent1: The hexokinase in our cells helps convert glucose into glucose-6-phosphate.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study hexokinase to understand how glucose is transformed into glucose-6-phosphate.
meanings.sent3: When the hexokinase enzyme gets to work, glucose turns into glucose-6-phosphate like magic!
meanings.sent4: The hexokinase enzyme acts like a tiny chef, cooking up glucose into glucose-6-phosphate.
meanings.sent5: Imagine hexokinase as a tiny worker bee, buzzing around and changing glucose into glucose-6-phosphate.

meanings.definition: A protein that plays a key role in the first step of glycolysis.
meanings.sent1: Hexokinase is an essential protein in the initial stage of glycolysis.
meanings.sent2: Cells rely on hexokinase to kickstart the process of glycolysis.
meanings.sent3: The party of glycolysis starts with hexokinase as the main guest!
meanings.sent4: In the dance of glycolysis, hexokinase takes the first step on the floor.
meanings.sent5: Think of hexokinase as the conductor leading the orchestra of glycolysis.
